alert.note: Alert for Northwestern San Juan Mountains; Southwest San Juan Mountains; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 02 at 6:12PM MST until January 03 at 6:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST TUESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Snow. New snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Locally higher amounts up to a foot are possible, especially west of Highway 550. * WHERE...Uncompahgre Plateau and Dallas Divide and the Northwest and Southwest San Juan Mountains. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow continues beyond this evening, however heavier snowfall rates will become more localized to higher elevations and lessen Tuesday through Tuesday evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northwestern San Juan Mountains; Southwest San Juan Mountains; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide
